
```{r}
inet <- asIgraph(net1)
cw=cluster_walktrap(inet)
modularity(inet,V(inet))
plot(cw,inet)
```

```{r}

netmat3=rbind(c(1,99))
net3=network(netmat3,type="edgelist")
inet3 <- asIgraph(net3)
cw3=cluster_walktrap(inet3)
modularity(inet3,V(inet3))
plot(cw3,inet3)
```


Part 4
```{r}
netmat2<-rbind(c(0,1,1,0,0,0,0,0,1),
               c(1,0,1,0,0,0,0,0,0),
               c(1,1,0,1,0,0,0,0,0),
               c(0,0,1,0,1,1,0,0,0),
               c(0,0,0,1,0,1,0,0,0),
               c(0,0,0,1,1,0,1,0,0),
               c(0,0,0,0,0,1,0,1,1),
               c(0,0,0,0,0,0,1,0,1),
               c(1,0,0,0,0,0,1,1,0))
rownames(netmat2)<-c("A","B","C","D","E","F","G","H","I")
colnames(netmat2)<-c("A","B","C","D","E","F","G","H","I")
net2=network(netmat2,type="adjacency")
```

```{r}
plot(net2,displaylabels=T,vertex.cex=3,vertex.col="red",boxed.labels=T,labels.pos=4)
```


```{r}
inet2=asIgraph(net2)
cw2=cluster_walktrap(inet2)
modularity(cw2)
plot(cw2,inet2)
```
